data.title: Great breakfast
data.text: This place had excellent service. Very friendly, and the prices are a great value! We will definitely plan to stop back in next time we are in town!

data.title: Donuts & Coffee all day long!
data.text: Good assortment of donuts, convenient location, you can customize your order of a dozen donuts, easily. Nice staff, friendly, helpful, courteous, professional

data.title: Fresh and friendly
data.text: Ok, so we're in Boulder County where everything should be organic and nonfat, right? Let's be honest people: a little indulgence every once in a while isn't going to kill ya'! We're talking DONUTS, folks! This Winchell's always serves 'em up fresh and mouth-watering. Great location in downtown Longmont. Smiling staff and well-stocked pastry racks, but don't get there too late in the day. Your favorite 'chocolate with sprinkles' may be made gone by another fan of the same:)

data.title: Good treat
data.text: Enjoyed some really good treats. Several varieties of donuts and an apple fritter. Not health food but a nice treat. Not very fancy atmosphere but also has some outside seating. Has a poster inside that says "With a donut in each hand, anything is possible."  😎

data.title: Great Staff
data.text: Staff are friendly and the doughnuts are really good. The customers tend to be a little odd, but always very friendly.Great food for a really good price.

data.title: Love this place
data.text: This is THE BEST donut shop in the world. Not exaggerating. The donuts are fresh around the clock - the owners are so friendly. The best thing? It's open 24 hours and sits right in the middle of the craft breweries in Longmont. Nothing better than a donut break in the middle of a pub crawl. Nirvana!!

data.title: Fresh Doughnuts!
data.text: The night before you can smell it on Main Street - dough being fried in the night! The selection in the morning is over-whelming. I had their bearclaw (huge!) topped with cinnamon and it was really different - in a good way. Also a great place for coffee - but it does tend to get crowded so be prepared...

data.title: Just What You'd Expect
data.text: This is like the old school Winchell's place you may have visited as a teen back-in-the day.  Wonderful selection of fresh that morning doughnuts for all to love.

data.title: Fantastic Donuts and Rolls
data.text: I love their large selection of donuts and rolls.  They are fresh, moist and tender.  I haven't tried their other breakfast selections but I'm sure they are very tasty.
